name: Paper pond (Schrippchen)
description:
How many jumps can you perform? 

Maneuver the frog from one water lily to  another and earn points.

I made this game with a friend of mine for the Mini Jam 79. The theme was "Frogs" and we had the limitation of only be able to make one level, so we decided to make an endless runner with a frog.

We hope that you will enjoy this small game, and we are curious to read your opinions in the comments!
